posts.post_content:
Posted By: Matt
Buy 2 or more cards and take 5% off the total.

The following cards are for sale or trade.  My asking prices should be what the same card would sell for on ebay - I'm not trying to ask for any more then that.    If you disagree with a price, please let me know.  I will honor the first response I get for each card that commits to taking it.  

Please had $5 shipping (USPS Priority with delivery conf.) and insurance is optional at USPS cost.  I prefer money orders/personal checks  but will accept Paypal if you add 3%.  


1914    Coupon Cigarettes        T213-2    TY COBB    PORTRAIT    10 Make an offer 
1933Goudey207MELVIN OTT30 SOLD
1934Goudey37LOU GEHRIG10 SOLD
1934-36 Diamond Stars14BILL TERRY193560 SOLD
1934-36 Diamond Stars1LEFTY GROVE193510 SOLD
1934-36 Diamond Stars9MICKEY COCHRANE193540 SOLD
1941Playball18HANK GREENBERG40 SOLD
1965Topps350MICKEY MANTLE20 SOLD

Raw:
1933Goudey138HERB PENNOCKPoor SOLD

Posted By: Matt
I have completed my trades and just sent emails to everyone who inquired about sales with prices.  If you emailed and did not get the pricing email this afternoon, please let me know.  I will post prices on whatever is left to the post above once everyone who emailed has had a chance to respond.

For some reason not everyone got the email I sent this afternoon - if you did not receive a price list, and previously emailed me about cards, let me know.
